description: A rich and silky tomato, garlic and bacon pasta sauce with juicy mussels. This incredibly tasty seafood spaghetti is ready in just 30 minutes.
name: Mussels With Spaghetti & Bacon Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 2 rashers rindless shortcut bacon, finely chopped

recipeInstructions.text: Cook spaghetti in a large saucepan of boiling water according to packet instructions. Drain, reserving 1 cup cooking liquid.

Heat oil in a large, deep frying pan over medium-high heat. Cook onion, bacon and garlic for 5 minutes, stirring, or until light golden. Add tomatoes and chilli, then bring to the boil. Reduce heat to medium and simmer, covered, for 5 minutes or until sauce has reduced slightly.
Meanwhile, bring 1/4 cup water to the boil in a large saucepan over high heat. Reduce heat to medium-high, add mussels and cook, covered, for 5 minutes or until mussels are cooked. Drain.

Add mussels, pasta and 3/4 cup reserved cooking liquid to tomato mixture, then stir over low heat, adding a little more reserved cooking liquid, if needed, for 2 minutes or until combined and heated through. Serve scattered with basil and parmesan.
